overview:
Louis-Junior Tshakoane is a Multimedia Artist ( Creates Graphic, Web & Audio Experiences) based in South Africa, at the age of 16 he was offered training equipment worth $200 000 by billionaire Sir Richard Branson to open a community gymnasium which is called Botho Gym; powered by Virgin Active.

In 2008 he received an international certification from Autodesk in 3D Design, Character Animation and Special Effects.

Between ages 17 & 18 he was a Marketing Consultant for large international companies such as Lamborghini and UBS AG in attracting high-net worth individuals to purchase luxury products and wealth management services.

He is currently pursing a Bachelor of Commerce Degree in Marketing Management at the University of South Africa (UNISA)

As part of a unique audio experience Louis is the author of Spiritual Evolution : Restoring Your Happiness.

He is also the co-creator of Frame - Show & Tell the World Whats Happening an online social utility designed to change the way people communicate with images & SMS through mobile devices.
